purpose: Facilitate the development of AI agents on Cloudflare's platform by providing a starter kit with essential tools and structure.
principle: Leverages Cloudflare Workers and Durable Objects to create scalable, serverless AI agents.
reusability: Designed as a starter kit with modular components, allowing developers to easily extend and customize for specific use cases.
limitations: Primarily tailored for Cloudflare's ecosystem, may not be directly applicable for other cloud providers.
name: agents-starter
description: A starter kit for building ai agents on Cloudflare
highlight: Seamless integration with Cloudflare's platform for building AI agents using Durable Objects.
